actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1976, to provide funds to conduct a study of the effects of the red tide on human health.

summary.text: Makes an appropriation of $187,500 for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for fiscal year 1976, to provide funds to conduct a study, under authority of the Public Health Service Act, of the effects of the red tide on human health.

titles.title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1976, to provide funds to conduct a study of the effects of the red tide on human health.
